channel.title: Comments on: Convert Double to BigDecimal

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I think you're probably using a native double as opposed to a Double object, you'll just need to convert from one to the other to get this code to work.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
I think you’re probably using a native double as opposed to a Double object, you’ll just need to convert from one to the other to get this code to work.

Matt

item.title: By: GJ
item.dc:creator: GJ
item.description: <p> >>String strNumber = number.toString(); <br/><br/>>> Cant do doubleValue.toString()<br/><br/>For Ref: <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$FILE/sad.gif"</a>><br/><br/>C:\TestBigDecimal.java:30: double cannot be dereferenced<br/><br/> String strNumber = amt1.toString();<br/><br/> ^<br/><br/>1 error</p>
item.content:encoded:
>>String strNumber = number.toString();

>> Cant do doubleValue.toString()

For Ref: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$FILE/sad.gif“>

C:\TestBigDecimal.java:30: double cannot be dereferenced

String strNumber = amt1.toString();

^

1 error
